titles.title: For the relief of Thomas Patrick McEvoy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/8/2001--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, for purposes of calculating the annual rate of non-service-connected disability pension paid to Thomas Patrick McEvoy of Macomb Township, Michigan, to exclude from the determination of his annual income any disability insurance benefit to which he is entitled for such year.
